name: Infrastructure Resource Specification
description: This Resource Specification is used to add a new Infrastructure

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: Name
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The alias of the Infrastructure as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: Datacenter VIM Name
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The alias of the Datacenter VIM as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: VIM id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The id of the Datacenter VIM.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: Organization
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The name of the organization that intends to use this infrastructure.
